alert.note: Alert for Gratiot; Isabella; Montcalm (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 2:11PM EDT until August 03 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Gratiot County in central Michigan... Southeastern Isabella County in central Michigan... Montcalm County in central Michigan... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 210 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Edmore, or 11 miles northeast of Stanton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mount Pleasant... Alma... Greenville... Ithaca... Stanton... St. Louis... Shepherd... Breckenridge... Edmore... Carson City... Wheeler... Crystal... Sidney... Sumner... Sheridan... McBride... Westville... Gowen... Elm Hall... Cedar Lake... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
